entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 13. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming south 20 km/h this afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 13. Wind chill minus 22 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 16. Wind chill near minus 25. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 12. POP 40%
